price: 76. Ayebaka maye mazali liboso na bango mpe sima. Mpe epai na Allah manso makozongaka.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
